title: It‚Äôs certainly secure‚Ä¶
text:
‚ÄúSign on to Office‚Äù‚Ä¶.the Dreaded Words appear. 

Dutifully, I tap the designated spot. I am am to authenticate, with the ironically named Authenticator, you‚Äôll understand the irony in a moment. A code is supplied, which I am to enter into Authenticator‚Ä¶except I am magically already in Authenticator. All I see is the code‚Ä¶with no place to enter it. It‚Äôs been like this since I‚Äôve installed the thrice-damned app. Another call to the help desk, I guess.

Congratulations, Microsoft. You have made your products secure from being accessed‚Ä¶.by everybody, including the account holder. Good job.

It‚Äôs easy if you have a second device, just open Authenticator there. But, I only have the one device; so I‚Äôm not worth Microsoft‚Äôs time.
